name: Pl-0-pm-0-compiler
tagline: pm0 compiler, scanner, parser, etc. PL/0 Compiler. Please also look at the wiki!
body:
# pl/0 Project, Assignment 4

pl/0 compiler, scanner, parser, etc.

**Group Members:** ---

**In order to compile this program, please enter into the command line:**

` 	"gcc compiler.c -o compile"`

**In order to run after compiling, enter:**

`	"./compile (-l) (-a) (-v) (input.txt)`

Where () are optional items.

If you do not enter an input filename, the program will assume the input is input.txt

**Arguments allowed:**

`-l: `

Print the list of lexemes/tokens to the screen

`-a: `

Print the generated assembly code to the screen

`-v: `

Print virtual machine execution trace to the screen

**Examples:**

`./compile -l -a -v` 

prints all output types to console

`./compile -v` 

prints only the virtual machine trace to console

`./compile` 

prints nothing except prompts for read and write
